item.title: Inpex 称印尼寻求加速阿巴迪液化天然气项目
item.description: 随着国内和整个地区能源需求的增长，印尼 Inpex 公司负责人表示，印尼正在寻求加快阿巴迪液化天然气项目。【原文：Indonesia is looking to speed up the Abadi liquefied natural gas project, with energy demand rising domestically and across the region, according to the head of Inpex Corp.】

item.title: 肯尼亚正与英国央行洽谈存储其寻求购买的黄金事宜
item.description: 肯尼亚东非国家央行行长表示，肯尼亚计划购买黄金以实现储备多样化，并已与英格兰银行就包括金银储存在内的议题进行了会谈。【原文：Kenya plans to buy gold to diversify its reserves and has held talks with the Bank of England on topics including bullion storage, the East African nation’s central bank governor said.】

item.title: 中国港口收费抬高油轮成本引发市场混乱
item.description: 中国的报复性港口征税使石油运输公司面临高昂的费用，使他们不得不争相办理相关手续，并导致延误、取消和运费飙升。【原文：China’s retaliatory port levies are exposing oil shipping companies to hefty fees, making them scramble for relevant paperwork, and contributing to delays, cancellations and spiraling freight costs.】

item.title: 波动率上升，VIX 曲线反转考验交易员的决心
item.description: 周五，新一轮贸易战的姿态令股市多头踉踉跄跄，但本周迄今为止，随着 S&P 500 指数收复了周尾一半的跌幅，多头的情绪得到了缓解。不过，熊市还没有完全屈服。【原文：Equity bulls, staggered Friday by fresh trade-war posturing, have so far gotten relief this week as the S&P 500 Index recouped half of its late-week losses. Bears, though, haven’t quite capitulated.】

item.title: 小米司机之死为中国电动车车门设计推波助澜
item.description: 一起涉及小米公司 SU7 电动轿车的死亡事故再次引起了人们对平齐式车门把手的关注，并可能加强中国对更严格安全标准的推动。SU7电动轿车的死亡事故再次引起了人们对平开门把手的关注，这很可能会加强中国对更严格安全标准的推动。【原文：A fatality involving a Xiaomi Corp. SU7 electric sedan has renewed scrutiny of flush car door handles and is likely to reinforce China’s push for tougher safety standards.】

item.title: 华为附属公司展示助推中国芯片雄心的产品
item.description: 就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁对中国获取先进技术实施更多限制的几天前，华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co.’s key partners are showcasing a dizzying array of products from software to chip gear just days after US President Donald Trump threatened more curbs on China’s access to advanced technologies.】

item.title: DHL 计划投资 3 亿欧元拓展非洲物流业务
item.description: DHL 集团计划在非洲投资 3 亿多欧元（3.49 亿美元）建设仓库和其他基础设施，以满足电子商务和可再生能源等行业的需求。【原文：DHL Group plans to invest more than €300 million ($349 million) in warehouses and other infrastructure in Africa to capitalize on demand from sectors such as e-commerce and renewable energy.】

item.title: 首席财务官称 ASML 已为中国稀土限制做好充分准备
item.description: ASML Holding NV 首席财务官罗杰-达森（Roger Dassen）周三表示，尽管对更广泛的芯片生态系统的影响难以评估，但 ASML Holding NV 已为中国限制稀土出口做好了 "充分准备"。【原文：ASML Holding NV is “well prepared” for China’s curbs on exports of rare earths even as the impact on the wider chips ecosystem is difficult to assess, Chief Financial Officer Roger Dassen said Wednesday.】

item.title: 大众汽车旗下斯堪尼亚在中国开设价值 20 亿欧元的卡车工厂
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）卡车品牌斯堪尼亚（Scania AB）在中国建立了一个价值 20 亿欧元（23 亿美元）的制造工厂，为全球最大的卡车市场供应卡车，并向亚洲出口。【原文：Volkswagen AG truck brand Scania AB has opened a €2 billion ($2.3 billion) manufacturing facility in China to supply trucks in the world’s biggest market as well as export to Asia.】

item.title: 贝利发表就业讲话后，英国债券跳涨，创四月以来最佳表现
item.description: 在英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）指出就业市场疲软后，英国债券跳涨，投资者押注英国央行将进一步降息。【原文：UK bonds jumped and investors bet on more Bank of England interest-rate reductions after Governor Andrew Bailey flagged a weaker jobs markets.】

item.title: 印度央行认为卢比受到投机攻击，将进一步干预
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士说，印度央行认为卢比最近的疲软是投机性攻击造成的，并准备继续进行市场干预，直到卢比稳定在一个较强的水平。【原文：India’s central bank considers recent weakness in the rupee as driven by speculative attacks and is prepared to continue its market intervention until the currency settles at a stronger level, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 大贬值交易大多只是炒作
item.description: 现在，它有了一个正式的名字："大贬值交易"。这是一个朗朗上口的术语，用来形容投资者对赤字失控和美元霸主地位受到威胁的各种担忧，以及明显的避险行为，即避开主权债务和相关货币，转而抢购贵金属、加密钱币和其他闪闪发光的东西。【原文：It now has a formal name: “The great debasement trade.” It’s a catchy term for all manner of investor hairpulling about runaway deficits and the dollar’s threatened primacy — and an apparent flight for refuge that means shunning sovereign debt and related currencies, and snapping up precious metals, crypto coins and other shiny stuff instead.】

item.title: Waymo 明年将在伦敦推出 Robotaxis，这标志着其在欧洲的首次亮相
item.description: Waymo 计划明年在伦敦推出无人驾驶打车服务，这是其第二次国际扩张，也是其在欧洲的首次扩张。【原文：Waymo is planning to launch its driverless ride-hailing service in London next year, marking its second international expansion and its first in Europe.】

item.description: 伦敦对贵金属的需求促使皇家造币厂超负荷运转。【原文：London’s demand for precious metals has pushed the Royal Mint into overdrive.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，开发商中国万科集团公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：Developer China Vanke Co. has made delayed interest payments on onshore debt that it had previously skipped, according to people familiar with the matter, potentially easing tensions with creditors.】

item.title: 据说印度化石公司正在考虑首次公开募股，可能会募集到 4 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着南亚新上市市场的升温，美国奢侈钟表制造商 Fossil Group Inc.【原文：Fossil Group Inc., the US-based luxury watchmaker, is considering an initial public offering of its Indian arm, according to people familiar with the matter, as the South Asian market for new listings heats up.】

item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. is jumping into Europe’s primary market on Wednesday as major US banks look to raise funds quickly after reporting quarterly earnings.】

item.title: Nscale 计划为微软建设德克萨斯州大型人工智能数据中心
item.description: Nscale是一家专注于人工智能的数据中心开发商，该公司周三发表声明称，已同意为微软公司在得克萨斯州建造一个发电能力高达240兆瓦的数据中心。【原文：Nscale, a data center developer focused on artificial intelligence, has agreed to build a site for Microsoft Corp. in Texas with a capacity of as much as 240 megawatts of power, according to a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国选择反对兽医价格控制后，Pets at Home 和 CVS 的业绩上升
item.description: 在英国反垄断监管机构呼吁加强兽医行业的竞争和监管改革，但未提出更广泛的定价控制措施后，Pets at Home Group Plc 和 CVS Group Plc 大涨。【原文：Pets at Home Group Plc and CVS Group Plc surged after the UK antitrust regulator called for more competition and a regulatory overhaul of the veterinary industry but stopped short of proposing broader pricing controls.】

item.title: 南非签署向中国出口核果的贸易议定书
item.description: 南非农业部长与中国签署了一项贸易议定书，首次向这个亚洲国家出口五种核果。【原文：South Africa’s agriculture minister signed a trade protocol with China to export five types of stone fruit to the Asian country for the first time.】

item.title: Finma 将就法院关于瑞士信贷 AT1 的裁决提起上诉
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构 Finma 表示，将对联邦行政法院撤销该监管机构 2023 年撤销瑞士信贷发行的 200 亿美元债券的命令的决定提出上诉。【原文：Swiss financial regulator Finma said it would appeal against a decision by the Federal Administrative Court to revoke the watchdog’s 2023 order to wipe-out $20 billion of bonds issued by Credit Suisse.】

item.title: Rimac 创始人称正与保时捷商讨收购布加迪事宜
item.description: 克罗地亚跑车制造商 Rimac 集团的创始人表示，他正在洽谈收购保时捷股份公司在其合资企业布加迪 Rimac 中的股份，并努力争取在明年之前达成交易。【原文：The founder of Croatian sports-car maker Rimac Group says he is in talks to buy out Porsche AG’s stake in their joint venture Bugatti Rimac and is working toward a deal by next year.】

item.title: 新加坡权衡封杀 TikTok 和 Facebook 内容的权力
item.description: 新加坡将成立一个机构，有权封杀包括 TikTok 和 Facebook 在内的平台上的有害网络内容，并表示正在加大力度打击网络诈骗和深度造假。【原文：Singapore will create an agency with powers to block harmful online content on platforms including TikTok and Facebook, saying it’s stepping up efforts to fight cyber-scams and deep fakes.】

item.title: 西班牙试图淡化特朗普的 "贸易惩罚 "威胁
item.description: 西班牙试图淡化美国总统唐纳德-特朗普因其拒绝增加国防开支而对其实施惩罚的威胁，并强调其对北约安全的承诺。【原文：Spain sought to downplay US President Donald Trump’s threat to impose punishment over its refusal to increase defense spending and stressed its commitment to NATO security.】

item.title: 爱尔兰 Makhlouf 对预算重点关注基础设施表示欢迎
item.description: 爱尔兰中央银行行长加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）对爱尔兰政府在预算中将重点放在基础设施建设上表示欢迎，此前他曾警告说，爱尔兰政府吸引投资的能力有赖于解决制约因素。【原文：Central Bank of Ireland Governor Gabriel Makhlouf welcomed the Irish government’s pivot to infrastructure in the budget after warning that its ability to attract investment relied on fixing constraints.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲应设法简化监管
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）说，欧洲需要分析在哪些方面可以简化金融规则，以使该行业更有效地运作。【原文：Europe needs to analyze where it can streamline financial rules to allow the industry to operate more effectively, European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said.】

item.title: 法国股市因政治前景改善而反弹，LVMH飙升
item.description: 法国股市大涨，因为投资者押注法国总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科尔努（Sebastien Lecornu）的新政府将在即将到来的不信任投票中胜出，LVMH 集团的盈利也为市场带来了提振。【原文：French stocks rallied as investors bet Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu’s new government will survive upcoming no-confidence votes, with the market also getting a boost from LVMH’s earnings.】

item.title: 中国总理2018年以来首次访问新加坡
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国总理李强将于本月晚些时候访问新加坡，这是七年来中国第二号官员首次访问新加坡，两国政府正努力深化关系。【原文：Chinese Premier Li Qiang will visit Singapore later this month, people familiar with the matter said, in the first trip to the country by China’s No. 2 official in seven years as the governments seek to deepen relations.】

item.title: 灾害保险损失连续六年超过 1000 亿美元
item.description: 2025 年，全球自然灾害造成的保险损失已超过 1,000 亿美元，尽管飓风活动受到抑制，导致第三季度的保险费用异常低廉。【原文：Global insurance losses from natural disasters have eclipsed $100 billion in 2025, even as subdued hurricane activity has resulted in unusually low third-quarter costs so far.】
